fields.title: Harris 1987 Business Real Estate Monitor Survey, study no. 871010

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey asks questions pertaining to corporate real estate decision making including best places to locate a business and where business conditions will improve.

fields.notesText:
Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: This is a special survey among 403 chief executive officers or their designees at companies nationwide with revenues of $250 million or over. These in-person interviews constitute a representative sampling of publicly- and privately-held companies listed in Dun
& Bradstreet, including both service and industrial organizations but systematically excluding nonprofit organization, government entities, and for-profit hospitals, schools, and colleges.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-871010;
